# GitHub Contribution Guide

This repository uses automated contributor onboarding:

- First issue welcome message
- First PR welcome/review-intro message
- First merged PR official onboarding message
- Active contributor retention milestone message

For full contribution workflow, coding standards, and release process, see:

- [../CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)

For standardized contributor message templates, see:

- [CONTRIBUTOR_MESSAGES.md](CONTRIBUTOR_MESSAGES.md)
